channel.title: Help with invisible thing!

item.title: Help with invisible thing!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

public boolean invisible = false;
if (command.startsWith("invisible"))
  {
if (invisible=(true)){
sendMessage("You are now visible!"); 
  pHead=82;
  pBeard=82; 
  pTorso=82;
  pArms=82;
  pHands=82;
  pLegs=82;
  pFeet=82;

  updateRequired = true; 
  appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
invisible = false;
}else{
  sendMessage("You are now invisible!"); 
  pHead=-100;
  pBeard=-100; 
  pTorso=-100;
  pArms=-100;
  pHands=-100;
  pLegs=-100;
  pFeet=-100;
  updateRequired = true; 
  appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
invisible = true;
  }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help with invisible thing!
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

Actually the original inbvusible commands were made by me on kaitnieks b4 the shut down is was a hide and show command make all those 82’s into -100s then make a command that reloads the regular pLooks which would mean making a couple more ints that are basically backups of your looks to change back into when you go back. (The 82’s turn you into a mine cart…)

item.title: Help with invisible thing!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

i have added this but now i need a code to mkae you un-invisible because i have to keep logging off to turn back to normal !

and also it turns me into a cart and not invisible how do you make it totally invisible?

This was made by tbau of runeStatus, before the wreck.
Just put this in client.java

if (command.startsWith("invisible")) { sendMessage("You are now invisible!"); pHead=82; pBeard=82; pTorso=82; pArms=82; pHands=82; pLegs=82; pFeet=82; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
You can rename the invisible or the ‘You are now invisible.’

Read full topic
